content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your interest, Baihu Li. The apartment is quite cozy and suitable for a single person or a couple. I would like to propose a rental price of 800 Euros per month. This price takes into account the size of the apartment and the location in the city. What do you think about this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am very pleased with the rental price. I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month. Thank you for your cooperation.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: You're welcome, Baihu Li. I'm glad to hear that you are pleased with the rental price. I appreciate your cooperation and look forward to having you as my tenant. If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have no other questions or concerns. I will sign the rental contract tomorrow. Thank you again for your help.

TERMINATE
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your prompt response, Baihu Li. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and look forward to having you as my tenant. If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask. I'm here to help.
name: Heinrich Heine
